name.ja: <ruby>終<rt>しゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>焔<rt>えん</rt></ruby>の<ruby>絶<rt>ぜつ</rt></ruby><ruby>望<rt>ぼう</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When an opponent's Level 8 or lower monster declares an attack on your face-up Maximum Monster, pay 600 LP.

effect.en: Shuffle the attacking monster into the owner's Deck. Then, if you have a monster in Maximum Mode on your field, inflict 600 damage to your opponent.
